--- title: "Les bibliothécaires référent·e·s" author: - Viviane Babeix - Julien Rabaud date: 2024-02-29 lang: fr format: html: default docx: default --- ::: {style="text-align: center;"} {{< bi stars color=#ffdd99 size=64px >}} ::: ## Par Collèges et parcours ::: panel-tabset ### Collège SSH (35) ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # Charger les bibliothèques nécessaires library(readr) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'readr' was built under R version 4.3.3 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(dplyr) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'dplyr' was built under R version 4.3.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Attaching package: 'dplyr' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': filter, lag ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following objects are masked from 'package:base': intersect, setdiff, setequal, union ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(DT) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'DT' was built under R version 4.3.3 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # Charger le fichier CSV file_path <- "../Masters.csv" data <- read_csv2(file_path) # Utiliser read_csv2 pour les fichiers avec séparateur ";" ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ℹ Using "','" as decimal and "'.'" as grouping mark. Use `read_delim()` for more control. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Rows: 82 Columns: 5 ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Delimiter: ";" chr (5): Collège, Mention, Parcours, Campus, Contact ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # Filtrer les données où la colonne "Collège" est "SSH" filtered_data <- data %>% filter(Collège == "SSH") %>% select(Parcours, Campus, Contact) # Afficher les données filtrées sous forme de tableau interactif datatable( filtered_data, options = list(pageLength = 10, autoWidth = TRUE), rownames = FALSE ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
